```pddl
(:action wash
    :parameters (?actor - entity ?item - entity ?location - location)
    :precondition (and 
        (at ?actor ?location)
        (not (clean ?item))
        (or (moisture ?item dry) (bleached ?item) (held_under_acetone ?item))
    )
    :effect (and
        (clean ?item)
        (not (dirty ?item))
    )
)

(:action lay
    :parameters (?entity - object ?target - location ?condition - condition)
    :precondition (and 
        (not (at_state ?entity ?condition))
        (at ?entity ?target)
    )
    :effect (and 
        (at_state ?entity ?condition)
        (in ?entity ?target)
    )
)

(:action wait
    :parameters (?entity - entity ?resource - resource)
    :precondition (and (waiting_condition ?entity ?resource))
    :effect (and (condition_met ?entity ?resource))
)

(:action choose
    :parameters (?npc - entity ?option - option ?context - context)
    :precondition (and 
        (valid_context ?context)
        (not (chosen ?option))
        (visible ?npc)
    )
    :effect (and 
        (chosen ?option)
        (updated_status ?context ?option)
    )
)

(:action bring
    :parameters (?agent - entity ?item - object ?target - location)
    :precondition (and (available ?agent) (not (at ?item ?target)))
    :effect (and (at ?item ?target))
)

(:action repeat
    :parameters (?entity - object ?task - task)
    :precondition (and (status ?entity in_progress) (task_type ?task repeatable))
    :effect (status ?entity completed)
)

(:action dry
    :parameters (?entity - object ?device - drying_device)
    :precondition (and (moisture ?entity wet))
    :effect (and (moisture ?entity dry) (not (moisture ?entity wet)))
)

(:action add
    :parameters (?actor - entity ?target - target ?resource - resource)
    :precondition (and 
        (at ?actor ?target) 
        (not (contains ?target ?resource))
        (valid ?resource)
        (ready_for_addition ?target ?resource)
    )
    :effect (and 
        (contains ?target ?resource)
        (not (empty ?target))
    )
)

(:action run
    :parameters (?entity - object ?resource - resource ?location - place ?state_before - state ?state_after - state)
    :precondition (and (resource ?resource) (entity ?entity) (location ?location) (entity_state ?entity ?state_before))
    :effect (and (entity_state ?entity ?state_after) (resource_location ?resource ?location) (movement ?entity active))
)

(:action clean
    :parameters (?agent - entity ?target - object)
    :precondition (and 
        (not (clean ?target))
        (ready ?agent)
        (dirty ?target)
    )
    :effect (and
        (clean ?target)
        (not (dirty ?target))
    )
)

(:action use
    :parameters (?npc - entity ?tool - resource)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?npc ?tool) (usable ?tool))
    :effect (used ?npc ?tool)
)

(:action check
    :parameters (?entity - entity ?resource - resource)
    :precondition (and (unprocessed ?entity) (not (processed ?entity)))
    :effect (and (processed ?entity) (updated ?resource))
)

(:action sit
    :parameters (?entity - object ?condition - condition)
    :precondition (and (applied ?condition ?entity))
    :effect (transformed ?entity)
)

(:action read
    :parameters (?entity - entity ?resource - object)
    :precondition (and 
        (tag_attached ?resource)
        (unread ?resource)
    )
    :effect (and
        (read ?resource)
        (safe_to_use ?resource)
    )
)

(:action hold
    :parameters (?p - entity ?obj - object ?tool - tool ?surface - surface)
    :precondition (and (prepared ?tool) (surface_ready ?surface) (task_ready ?obj))
    :effect (and (held_under ?tool ?obj) (not (task_ready ?obj)))
)

(:action apply
    :parameters (?actor - entity ?resource - object ?target - object)
    :precondition (and 
        (prepared ?resource)
        (ready ?target)
        (not (applied ?actor ?resource ?target))
    )
    :effect (and
        (applied ?actor ?resource ?target)
        (transformed ?target)
    )
)

(:action juice
    :parameters (?entity - object ?liquid - substance)
    :precondition (and (not (processed ?liquid)))
    :effect (processed ?liquid)
)

(:action determine
    :parameters (?entity - object)
    :precondition (and
        (not (determined ?entity))
    )
    :effect (determined ?entity)
)

(:action moisturize
    :parameters (?entity - object ?location - place)
    :precondition (and (at ?entity ?location) (prepared ?entity))
    :effect (moisturized ?entity)
)
```
